spawn.name: The Spawn Clearing
spawn.description: A peaceful meadow where warriors begin their journey. The grass is trampled from countless battles. To the north lies a village, east leads to a dense forest, and west opens to rocky plains.

village.name: Abandoned Village
village.description: Empty houses line a dirt road, their windows dark and doors ajar. Shadows move between buildings. The spawn clearing lies south, ruins stretch east, and a bridge crosses north to mountain paths.

forest_entrance.name: Forest Entrance
forest_entrance.description: Tall pines create a natural archway. Sunlight filters through thick branches above. The clearing lies west, deeper forest extends north, and a river flows east.

rocky_plains.name: Rocky Plains
rocky_plains.description: Jagged stones jut from barren earth. Wind howls across the desolate landscape. The spawn clearing lies east, caves tunnel north, and canyons stretch south.

ruins.name: Ancient Ruins
ruins.description: Crumbling stone structures hint at a forgotten civilization. Vines snake through broken walls. The village lies west, a temple stands north, and forest paths lead south.

mountain_bridge.name: Mountain Bridge
mountain_bridge.description: A narrow stone bridge spans a deep chasm. Mountain peaks tower on both sides. The village lies south, dangerous peaks stretch north, and eastern paths lead to a temple.

deep_forest.name: Deep Forest
deep_forest.description: Ancient trees tower overhead, blocking most sunlight. Strange sounds echo in the darkness. Forest entrance lies south, a hidden grove waits east, and thick undergrowth blocks other paths.

river_crossing.name: River Crossing
river_crossing.description: A rushing river blocks further passage. Stepping stones provide treacherous footing. Forest entrance lies west, a waterfall crashes north, and forest paths continue south.

cave_entrance.name: Cave Entrance
cave_entrance.description: A dark opening yawns in the mountainside. Cool air flows from within. Rocky plains lie south, the cave depths extend north, and mountain paths wind east.

canyon.name: Narrow Canyon
canyon.description: High walls of red rock create a natural corridor. Echoes bounce off stone surfaces. Rocky plains lie north, the canyon deepens west, and a mountain path climbs east.

temple.name: Sacred Temple
temple.description: Marble columns support a domed roof. Ancient symbols cover every surface. This sacred place connects ruins to the south, mountain bridge to the west, and a hidden grove to the east.

forest_path.name: Winding Forest Path
forest_path.description: A well-worn trail winds through mixed woodland. Leaves crunch underfoot with each step. The path connects ruins to the north, river crossing to the north-east, and leads to a waterfall east.

mountain_peak.name: Mountain Peak
mountain_peak.description: The highest point offers a commanding view of all below. Cold wind cuts through thin air. Only the mountain bridge provides access south, making this a dangerous dead end.

hidden_grove.name: Hidden Grove
hidden_grove.description: A circular clearing surrounded by towering oaks. Sunlight streams through leaves, creating dancing shadows. Paths lead to deep forest west, temple west-southwest, and waterfall south.

waterfall.name: Thundering Waterfall
waterfall.description: Water cascades from great heights, creating a misty spray. The sound is deafening. Paths connect to river crossing north, hidden grove north, forest path west, and cave depths southwest.

cave_depths.name: Cave Depths
cave_depths.description: Darkness engulfs this underground chamber. Water drips constantly from stalactites above. The cave entrance lies south, canyon depths east, and waterfall northeast.

mountain_path.name: Treacherous Mountain Path
mountain_path.description: A narrow ledge hugs the mountainside. One wrong step means certain death. The path connects cave entrance west, canyon east, making it a crucial bottleneck.

canyon_depths.name: Canyon Depths
canyon_depths.description: The deepest part of the canyon system where walls tower impossibly high. Strange echoes suggest hidden chambers. Canyon entrance lies east, cave depths west.
